missionVision.title: Our Mission
missionVision.description: To provide exceptional British education that nurtures academic excellence, character development, and global citizenship in our students.

missionVision.title: Our Vision
missionVision.description: To be the leading British curriculum school in Abuja, recognized for academic rigor, innovative teaching, and holistic student development.

missionVision.title: Our Values
missionVision.description: We uphold respect, scholarship, and resilience as the foundation of our educational philosophy and daily practice.

paragraphs: Founded on Excellence. Established in 2010, Oxford Manor College delivers a rigorous British curriculum to students in Abuja. Our mission is to nurture leadership, scholarship, and resilience.
Over the years, we have built a reputation for academic excellence, with outstanding IGCSE results and a strong track record of university placements both locally and internationally.

values.title: RESPECT
values.description: Honoring diversity, dignity, and individual worth, fostering an inclusive and caring community.

values.title: SCHOLARSHIP
values.description: Pursuing academic excellence through rigorous inquiry and nurturing intellectual curiosity.

values.title: RESILIENCE
values.description: Building strength, perseverance, and adaptability, thriving in new challenges.
